title: LanSchool 7.0.0.7 Teacher and Student Version
description:
This is the installer for Lanschool Teacher/Student version 7.0.0.7

======
======

>>>INSTALLATION

1) Double-click "Setup.exe"
2) Rock hard.

This isn't a cracked version, and a serial is not required.


======
======

>>>Upgrading to v7.2

	If you would like to use the version 7.2.0.2 teacher's client,
	copy over "Teacher.exe" to the installation directory.


======
======

Also worth noting. The teacher client, by default, will only scan one
channel or "room" at a time for active computers.

This can be overrided with a simple registry edit after installation.

I've taken the liberty to include the registry modification in this 
torrent. It's the file called "scan all channels.reg". Just double-click
to apply the fix. Be sure to restart the application afterward.


Enjoy.
